attributes.action: No War involvement with Syria or Unites States of America's coalition in Syria.
attributes.additional_details:
People of the United Kingdom do not support military intervention through the coalition of the United States in Syria.It is not in the best interest of this nation. Confronting Russia is a serious threat to our national security; diplomacy is needed and as a member of the people I demand the Government consult Parliament.

I demand this Government abide by the will of the British public when committing such heinous acts. The public deserve a voice in this matter before public funds this cause.
attributes.background: There is no justification for chemical weapon attacks targeting civilians of the sort that we saw in Douma. Further military intervention is not the solution and confrontation with Russia is a risk to our National Security. Diplomacy is necessary, use the framework provided by the United Nations
